content:
# I have successfully crafted one Stone Furnace, and my inventory now contains 1 Stone Furnace, 20 coal, 15 stone, and 20 iron ore. 
# The next step is to smelt the iron ore into iron plates using the Stone Furnace.

# I will place the Stone Furnace in the environment and then use it to smelt the iron ore.

# Place the Stone Furnace at a suitable location
furnace_position = (0, 0)  # Example position; adjust based on the environment
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, furnace_position)  # Place the Stone Furnace at the specified position

# Now, I will load the furnace with coal as fuel and iron ore as the input resource for smelting.
load_fuel(furnace_position, Prototype.Coal, quantity=5)  # Load 5 coal into the furnace
load_input(furnace_position, Prototype.IronOre, quantity=10)  # Load 10 iron ore into the furnace

# Start the smelting process
start_smelting(furnace_position)

# Check the inventory again to see the current state after loading resources into the furnace.
print(f"Inventory after loading resources into the furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")
